unnormalised: Hey future IITians and doctors! Tired of endless scrolling for the perfect scholarship? There's a better way! Scholarship portals are becoming the 'it' thing in EdTech, think of them as online mandaps matchmaking you with financial aid.
normalised: Hey future I I Tians and doctors! Tired of endless scrolling for the perfect scholarship? There's a better way! Scholarship portals are becoming the 'it' thing in EdTech, think of them as online mandaps matchmaking you with financial aid.

unnormalised: Platforms like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are streamlining the whole process. No more running around collecting forms like it's 1990. Just create a profile, fill in your details, including your board exam score and boom - personalised suggestions!
normalised: Platforms like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are streamlining the whole process. No more running around collecting forms like it's one thousand nine hundred and ninety. Just create a profile, fill in your details, including your board exam score and boom - personalised suggestions!

unnormalised: These portals list scholarships for everything from engineering at Anna University to fine arts grants. They even have options for students from smaller towns like Raipur. Many have registration deadlines, so don't wait until the last minute - some close by 15/08/2024! Plus, several offer helpful webinars – check out one scheduled for 10:00 hrs on 20/07/2024 about acing your scholarship application.
normalised: These portals list scholarships for everything from engineering at Anna University to fine arts grants. They even have options for students from smaller towns like Raipur. Many have registration deadlines, so don't wait until the last minute - some close by fifteenth august two thousand and twenty four! Plus, several offer helpful webinars – check out one scheduled for ten o'clock on twentieth july two thousand and twenty four about acing your scholarship application.

unnormalised: With rising tuition fees - think Rs. 2 Lakhs per year at private colleges - these portals are a blessing. The Ministry of Education also promotes these! So, Dosto, ditch the stress, log on, and find the scholarship that’s right for you, maybe even before your chai break at 16:00 hrs.
normalised: With rising tuition fees - think rupees two lakhs per year at private colleges - these portals are a blessing. The Ministry of Education also promotes these! So, Dosto, ditch the stress, log on, and find the scholarship that’s right for you, maybe even before your chai break at sixteen o'clock.
